definitions: in a way that is severe or harsh in appearance or outline

examples.text: the scar stood out starkly against his bronzed skin

shortDefinitions: in manner that is severe in appearance or outline

definitions: in an unpleasantly or sharply clear way

examples.text: her motivations contrast starkly with Clara's
their ordeal starkly illustrates an inescapable reality
the class divisions of the country were starkly revealed

shortDefinitions: in unpleasantly or sharply clear way
